mapper.select: select s.*, i.*, nvl(A.store_idx, 0) likeStore from store s inner join store_info i on s.idx = i.store_idx left join (select store_idx from like_store where member_id = #{id}) A on A.store_idx = s.idx where s.idx = #{storeIdx}
select img_name from store_img where store_idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: update store set category = #{category}, store_name = #{store_name}, introduce = #{introduce}, location1 = #{location1}, location2 = #{location2} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select count(idx) from store_img where store_idx = #{storeIdx}
mapper.delete: delete from store_img where store_idx = #{storeIdx} and img_name = #{img}
mapper.update: update store set main_img = #{mainImg} where idx = #{storeIdx}
